answers.answer: Google the symptoms of preeclampsia, I believe this is one of them.
If its under your right rib cage it could be your gaulbladder or however you spell it.

This sometimes is a result of constipation , I found when i was suffering a similar feeling either that or bub's positioning may be affecting it ?, but remember u can still be having movements and be constipated , pay attention to any changes in bowel habits , good luck!

question: I often get sharp pains under my rib cage and at times I could cry.....I am 24 weeks and 3 days. My first son was 9lbs and even stilk didn't causr this kind of pain
title: Right sided pain by rib cage
